amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5635 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5635 ruled in order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 5635 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 11. Record Vote Number: 204.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 5635.

Amendment SA 5635 proposed by Senator Baucus to Amendment SA 5633. (consideration: CR S9243-9246, S9253-9254, S9255-9256) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 5635 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 11. Record Vote Number: 204.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5635 proposed by Senator Baucus to Amendment SA 5633.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5635 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
